api_list.name: citycode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lashou.p.rapidapi.com/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lashou.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: details

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: city code, or city name. eg. 北京，深圳

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lashou.p.rapidapi.com/detail/city/2419/p/1/r/100"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lashou.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lashou.p.rapidapi.com/detail/city/{city}/p/{page}/r/{num}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lashou.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
